Package io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.spring.api

Interface RhymeLinkBuilder

public interface RhymeLinkBuilder
An intermediate stage during link generation that is returned by UrlFingerprinting.createLinkWith(WebMvcLinkBuilder) and allows adding adding name and title attributes before calling build() to finally create the link.
See Also:
  • UrlFingerprinting

    • withTemplateVariables

      RhymeLinkBuilder withTemplateVariables(String... names)
      Ensures that a link template is generated that contains query parameter variables with all the given names. If the link already contains resolved query parameters with the same names, they are removed.
      Parameters:
      names - of the query parameter variables to add
      Returns:
      this

    • withoutFingerprint

      RhymeLinkBuilder withoutFingerprint()
      Allows to disable the addition of fingerprinting parameters only for the link that is currently being built
      Returns:
      this

    • build

      io.wcm.caravan.hal.resource.Link build()
      Finishes building the link
      Returns:
      a fully populated Link instance to be returned by your implementation of LinkableResource.createLink()

    • buildLinked

      <T extends io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.resources.LinkableResource> T buildLinked(Class<T> halApiInterface)
      Finishes building the link and create a proxy instance that returns this link when LinkableResource.createLink() is called.

      This can be used to implement a method annotated with Related where you can't create a full implementation of a given HalApiInterface, but you can create a Link with a URI pointing to such a resource.

      Type Parameters:
      T - the return type
      Parameters:
      halApiInterface - an interface annotated with HalApiInterface
      Returns:
      a proxy instance on which only LinkableResource.createLink() can be called
